price: Vayan tú y tu hermano acompañados de Mis milagros, y no descuiden Mi recuerdo.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
